sentences: Peab kümne küünega endale igapäevast leiba teenima.
Ta on oma kümne küünega need põllud rajanud.
Selle varanatukese on ta kümne küünega kokku kraapinud.
context: The word 'kümne' is the genitive singular form of the Estonian numeral 'kümme' (ten). In this context, it appears as part of the idiom 'kümne küünega' which means 'with ten nails' - an expression that conveys doing something with one's own hands or through hard physical labor. It emphasizes personal effort and self-reliance.
